'''''Christie's Valuable Manuscripts and Printed Books 7 June 2006''''' is an auction catalogue which includes a reproduction of a [[Letter to Robert Burchfield (6 November 1954)|1954 letter from J.R.R. Tolkien to Robert Burchfield]] (lot 216).<ref>{{CG|C}}, pp. 443-4</ref><ref>[http://www.tolkienbooks.net/php/details.php?reference=72840 Valuable Manuscripts and Printed Books] at [http://www.tolkienbooks.net Tolkienbooks.net] (accessed 11 February 2011)</ref>
